handlers.label: DB Config Update
handlers.description: Changes values of core_config_data table in a Magento instance. It reads its database parameters from app/etc/local.xml - therefore it needs to be placed after any adjustments of DB credentials.

handlers.label: Marker Replacements
handlers.description: Simply replaces a given marker in a file.

handlers.label: File Additions
handlers.description: Adds the content from one file to the content of another file.

handlers.label: File Prepends
handlers.description: Prepends the content from one file to the content of another file (This is just a shortcut for the AddFileContent handler).

handlers.label: Local Env Vars
handlers.description: Allows you to set variables that can be used in all following handlers using ###VAR:<variableName>###.

handlers.label: Copied Files
handlers.description: Allows you to copy a file from sourceFile path to targetFile path.
